name: Heated Eyelash Curlers - Electric Eyelash Curler for Makeup Tools USB Rechargeable, Fast Heat up Within 10s - 24 Hours Long Lasting, with 4 Heating Modes Eyelash Curlers with LED Display (White)
about_this_item: 【Quick Natural Curling】The eyelash curlers can fast heat up within 10s,without a long wait, and the curved curler head can quickly creates the perfect natural curling eye makeup. Use after heating for 30s to achieve better results. with mascara,can quickly and easily and separate eyelashes, get super 24 hours long lasting natural curl eyelashes, let your eyes deeper and more natural.

【4 Heating Modes & LED Display】Adjustment heating modes heated eyelash curlers, with an led display, 55°C (131°F), 65℃(149℉), 75℃(167℉), 85℃（185℉），there is always a temperature that suits you.It's easy to operate, with the touch of a button to quickly switch the temperature, suitable for a variety of curved and thick lashes, whether you want natural everyday light makeup or party makeup, this lash curler can meet your needs perfectly!

【Careful Design and Safety Protection】This electric eyelash curler is easy to operate. The 15°arc brush head fits your lashes better, temperature memeory function, can directly display the temperature set in the last use. The lash curler with 5 minutes no-operation auto-break, anti-misoperation, heat insulation protection comb.he thermal insulating protection slots can avoid heat contacting the eyelid .

【Easy to Carry】 Heated eyelash curlers it fits neatly into a handbag or makeup case and can be taken out and used at any time without taking up too much space,Convenient design makes it ideal for on-the-go use.

【Type-C Charging 】The advanced heated eyelash curler usb rechargeable, using Type-C charging saving battery costs (including charging cable), and can be charged with chargers, computers, rechargeable batteries, etc,so you can travel worry-free and charge at any time(Usage Tips：Make sure the Eyelash Curler is fully charged for 1-2 h before using it for the first time).
【After-Sales Service】 We are committed to providing high-quality GACAVKS heated eyelash curlers for lovers and mothers,provides best experience.We provide 100% satisfaction service to customers.
